description.p: Gain a +1 to melee attack rolls and damage rolls with weapon. This weapon can be used as a spellcasting focus. You no longer gain disadvantage on ranged spells while engaged in melee when using weapon as a spellcasting focus.

This staff has 5 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability modifier: cure wounds (1 charge per spell level, up to 3rd) or lesser restoration (2 charges).
The staff regains 1d4 +1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff vanishes in a flash of light, lost forever.

set.name: attunement
set.addition: by a bard, cleric, or druid
